channel.title: Control Windows7 using only the Force
channel.description:
[url]https://www.engadget.com/2010/11/25/kinect-hack-lets-you-control-a-web-browser-using-only-the-force/[/url]
There may be a decent use for kinect yet.

item.title: Control Windows7 using only the Force
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
it can be done with the wiimote, hell I’ve done something similar with the regular sixaxis ps3 controller, it’s really not that great.

item.title: Control Windows7 using only the Force
item.dc:creator: loony636
item.description:
Spriter-San:

Anyway, that indeed seems like the only thing Kinect would be useful for, considering all of the games for it are terrible.

I think Kotaku (in the same article as this) said that it was ironic that all of the great ideas for the Kinect had nothing to do with gaming, except perhaps the lightsaber one.

item.dc:creator: OldDirtyBastard
item.description:
yeah, only you have to actually point at the kinect and not at the monitor itself. It’s not like screen-you distance is comparable between PC and Xbox as well… you get the idea

But yeah, the second vid sorta proves me wrong, as the guy still has to be further away from the monitor
